title: A Piano for Mrs. Cimino (1982 - USA) Bette Davis
description:
A Piano for Mrs. Cimino (1982 - USA)

Drama
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0084494/


2 Award WINS and 1 Award NOMINATION

Starring Bette Davis as Esther Cimino, a 73-year-old widow, the film traces the events following Esther's son George's decision that she is no longer capable of caring for herself in her elderly state. Despite her protests, Esther is ruled incompetent by the legal system, leading her to wage a court battle to regain not only her estate but her dignity as well.


Video: DivX5, 464x352, 25.000 fps, 954 Kbps, 01h31m29s
Audio: MP3, 44100 Hz, stereo, 103 kbps

TVRip, English audio, no subtitles
